overview: David Lowery is singer songwriter and guitarist for the legendary alt/indie bands Cracker and Camper Van Beethoven. These two bands have sold over a million records and had a dozen modern rock hits. He is also a record producer of some notoriety recording records for The Counting Crows, Jason Molina, Magnolia Electric Company, Lucero, Sparklehorse many more. In February of 2011 429/Savoy Records will release his first solo record “The Palace Guards”.
